content: The "Small Business Investment Company Amendments Act of 2001" may be cited as the Act. It includes provisions related to subsidy fees. The Small Business Investment Act of 1958 is amended to adjust subsidy fees, with the maximum amount not exceeding 1.38 percent per year. The changes are effective until September 30, 2001.
